MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 14-JAN-2021 23:30.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the SY24 postcode area of Bow Street, affecting properties in Maes Afallen and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.26PM. Our engineers have arrived on site to make repairs to a fault on our underground cable network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by attaching generators onto the network by 11.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.39PM on 14th January 2021.
